text: Essert-Pittet is a former municipality of the district of Jura-Nord vaudois of the canton of Vaud in Switzerland. On 1 January 2017 the former municipalities of Essert-Pittet and Corcelles-sur-Chavornay merged into the municipality of Chavornay.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz accessed 10 January 2017 == References == Category:Former municipalities of Vaud
title: Essert-Pittet
